metadata.title: CVE-2025-0376 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An XSS vulnerability exists in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from13.3 prior to 17.6.5, 17.7 prior to 17.7.4 and 17.8 prior to 17.8.2 thatallows an attacker to execute unauthorized actions via a change page.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
